section.title: Best Practices When Creating Keys
section.para: When using Elektra to store your application's configuration and state, please keep in mind the following rules:

listitem.para: You are not allowed to create keys right under system or user.
You are not allowed to create folder keys right under system or user. They are reserved for very essential OS subsystems.
The keys for your application, called say MyApp, should be created under system/sw/MyApp and/or user/sw/MyApp.
